item.title: Copenhagen is adapting to a warmer world with rain tunnels and 'sponge parks'
item.description: Copenhagen is expected to receive 30% more rainfall by the end of the century. The city is responding with a massive long-term adaptation plan.

item.title: Why taking apart buildings piece by piece is a climate solution

item.title: Young men swung for Trump in 2024. Democrats are working on a plan to win them back
item.description: Democrats lost serious ground with young men in the 2024 presidential election. Now, some within the party are working to win them back.
